document.full_text: nokia corp. on tuesday warned its second-quarter sales and margins will be much lower than expected as rivals challenge the world's largest handset maker in both smartphones and low-end devices.
document.title: nokia shares plunge after profit warning
lines_and_colors: nokia corp. on tuesday warned its second-quarter sales and margins will be much lower than expected as rivals challenge the world's largest handset maker in both smartphones and low-end devices.
